title: Jawadu

content: Qi proposed to utilize blockchain technology not only for maintaining a decentralized payment network but also for storing computer code that can be used to power tamper-proof decentralized financial contracts and applications.Learn more about QI BlockchainRules:- Make at least 20 constructive posts per week- Only English posts will be counted- Posts must be at least 150 characters in length- Spam, Offtopic, Bounty reports, Gambling, and subs are not counted- Negative trust is not allowed- You MUST wear the avatar and signature- Multiple accounts per user are not permittedWe reserve the right to update the rules. Any updates will be announced in this thread.Payments:- Member: $15 per week- Full Member: $25 per week- Senior Member: $35 per week- Hero Member: $50 per week- Legendary Member: $60 per weekPayments will be made every Sunday in QIE coins.
